basics.name: Viresh Duvvuri
basics.summary: Prompt Engineer specializing in production AI systems and evaluation frameworks, with 5+ years building GenAI solutions through prompt engineering, chain-of-thought orchestration, and human-centric design. Builder-first mindset with proven track record shipping AI systems that improved user productivity by 70-80% through iterative prompt engineering, comprehensive evaluation pipelines, and user-centric approach to AI-human partnership. Strong written communicator bridging technical complexity with user empathy.

highlights: Designed and deployed production prompt engineering strategies for multi-agent AI system, architecting chain-of-thought reasoning through specialized agent orchestration that reduced analyst workflows by 70% within 2 months, establishing evaluation frameworks measuring prompt effectiveness, reasoning quality, and user satisfaction across 50-100 daily queries

Built comprehensive evaluation pipelines testing AI behavior against quality goals, implemented human-in-the-loop testing frameworks with diverse user populations, tracked prompt performance metrics (latency, accuracy, cost) through continuous A/B testing and iterative refinement on AWS infrastructure with full observability

Shipped user-centric AI co-pilot focusing on human-AI partnership philosophy, designed prompts that augment domain experts rather than replace them, gathered user feedback driving rapid iteration cycles improving response relevance by 60% within first quarter through empathetic understanding of analyst workflows

Built and deployed production prompt engineering system for automated diagnostics using foundation model APIs (Ollama, Llama 3.2), designed chain-of-thought prompting guiding AI through complex reasoning processes for technical analysis, established robust evaluation frameworks measuring diagnostic accuracy and user trust, serving 200+ daily queries with continuous prompt optimization based on user feedback

Contributed to drone platform codebases implementing new features and optimizations for flight control systems and payload integration across multiple product lines, managed software integration projects from planning through release

Led release management for drone platforms overseeing testing phases from alpha through production deployment, coordinating firmware updates and executing comprehensive testing protocols with cross-functional teams
Built automated systems to process complex technical data and identify system failures, developing knowledge base enhancements and support tools that streamlined operations
Wrote embedded code in C++ to integrate LiDAR and optical flow sensors for obstacle avoidance and position holding with/without GPS under various lighting conditions

Collaborated with open-source flight control software maintainers for integration, testing, and deployment of autonomous flight algorithms, prototyped innovative features like toss-to-launch for product roadmap development
Developed prototype software for in-house autonomous surveillance mobile robots using ROS2, SLAM, and computer vision technologies
Built Human Machine Interface for Universal Robot welding applications using Python and Kivy framework, implemented multi-robot control systems with platform independence

projects.name: GridCOP: Smart Grid Analytics Agent
highlights: Problem: Power grid analysts needed intelligent AI companion to understand complex data patterns, requiring chain-of-thought reasoning through multi-step analytical processes beyond basic automation

Solution: Designed prompt engineering architecture where specialized agents coordinate through reasoning steps, implemented chain-of-thought orchestration using LangChain and MCP, built comprehensive evaluation framework testing AI behavior against user goals, deployed on AWS with observability measuring prompt effectiveness and user satisfaction

Impact: Enhanced analyst productivity by 70% through empathetic AI partnership that elevates domain experts, established robust evaluation pipelines with diverse user populations demonstrating reliable production performance at scale, achieved user trust through transparent reasoning and continuous improvement

projects.name: Production System Optimization Tool
highlights: Problem: Expert analysis bottlenecks requiring hours of specialized knowledge, users needed AI companion providing thoughtful guidance rather than simple automation

Solution: Designed chain-of-thought prompting system guiding foundation models (Ollama, Llama 3.2) through diagnostic reasoning processes, built full-stack application with React frontend and Python Flask backend, implemented evaluation frameworks measuring diagnostic accuracy and user confidence through iterative testing

Impact: Transformed expert workflows from hours to minutes while maintaining quality, deployed to production serving 200+ daily queries, gathered continuous user feedback driving prompt refinement achieving 80% reduction in manual analysis time through empathetic user-centric design

projects.name: AI Travel Planner Agent
highlights: Problem: Manual travel planning requiring creative problem-solving across inconsistent information sources, demonstrating novel prompting challenges in unstructured domains

Solution: Built conversational AI agent using Claude 3.5 Sonnet and LangChain, designed prompts enabling personalized itinerary generation through chain-of-thought reasoning across multiple data sources (DuckDuckGo Search API), implemented user-centric conversation flows adapting to diverse preferences

Impact: Demonstrated end-to-end prompt engineering lifecycle from concept to deployment, learned advanced conversational AI patterns and real-time context adaptation, showcased comfort with ambiguity in rapidly evolving AI space through experimental approach and creative solutions
